DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : Exercising regularly may lower risk breast cancer . PURPOSE : This randomized clinical trial study well exercise prevents breast cancer healthy young woman .
DOC.brief_title: Women Steady Exercise Research Formerly Women , Oxidative Stress , Exercise Estrogens ( WOSEE )
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : Primary - Compare change urine level stable marker oxidative stress ( F_2-isoprostanes ) healthy young woman undergo exercise training 4 menstrual cycle vs exercise . Secondary - Assess change metabolic factor explain association physical activity breast cancer , include : Estrogen metabolism ( estrone , estradiol , estriol , 2-OHE_1 , 2-OHE_2 , 2-MeOHE_1 , 2-MeOHE_2 , 4-OHE_1 , 4-OHE_2 [ well ratios metabolite ] , insulin-like growth factor ( IGF ) -1 ( well IGF-binding proteins-1 , -2 , -3 , insulin , glucose , body composition ( include body mass index , lean mass , body fat [ DEXA scan ] ) . OUTLINE : This randomize , control study . Participants stratify accord baseline body fat percentage age ( 18 24 year vs 25 30 year ) . Participants randomize 1 2 intervention arm . - Arm I : Participants exercise 30 minute 5 time week . The intensity exercise increase every 4 week . The exercise regimen continue 4 menstrual cycle . - Arm II : Participants observe 4 menstrual cycle . Participants arm undergo 24-hour collection urine day 7 , 8 , 9 menstrual cycle 1 6 . F_2-isoprostanes measure via gas chromatography-mass spectrometry ( GC/MS ) . Estrogens also measure GC/MS include E_1 , E_2 , E_3 , 2-OHE_1 , 2-OHE_2 , 4-OHE_1 , 4-OHE_2 , 2-MeE_1 , 2-MeE_2 , 4-MeE_1 , 4-MeE_2 , 16OHE_1 . Participants undergo blood collection , body mass measurement dual-energy x-ray absorptiometry , fitness assessment twice 6-month study . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 400 participant accrue .
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman Selfreported menstrual cycle length 2535 day within past 2 month Nonsmoker Sedentary ( exercise < 3 time weekly within past 6 month ) Intact ovaries uterus No history gynecological problem ( e.g. , fibroid , endometriosis , polycystic ovary syndrome ) Female Premenopausal Body mass index 18.5 40 Stable weight ( change â‰¥ 10 % within past year ) No pregnancy breast feeding within past 6 month No plan become pregnant study treatment No cancer within past 5 year except nonmelanoma skin cancer No medical condition would prohibit participation vigorous program weightbearing aerobic exercise include , limited , follow : Fibromyalgia Chronic fatigue syndrome Metabolic disorder Recent cardiovascular event Orthopedic limitation Psychiatric disorder require antipsychotic drug No uncontrolled hypertension ( systolic blood pressure [ BP ] > 160 mm Hg and/or diastolic BP > 99 mm Hg ) No 7 alcoholic beverage per week No injected hormonal contraceptive use within past year More 6 month since prior use intrauterine device More 3 month since prior oral patch hormone contraceptives No medication would prohibit participation vigorous program weightbearing aerobic exercise
